item.title: CV
item.description: English CV Chinese CV Education PhD in Informatics — University of Edinburgh — 2023-Now 3-year doctoral programme at the Institute for Language, Cognition and Computation (ILCC), working with the StatMT group. Working on multilingual LLMs, interpretability of LLMs, NMT. Supervised by Dr. Alexandra Birch and Dr. Barry Haddow. MSc in Computer Science — Dalian University of Technology — 2017-2020 3-year postgraduate degree in Software Engineering, specialised in Natural Language Processing. Working on Neural Machine Translation.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Large Commercial Neural Machine Translation January 2023 to September 2023 Responsibility: developing commercial NMT with LLM, designing the multilingual training data proportion Achievements: Performance based on PanGu LLM on par with existing end-to-end NMT model in 10+ languages End-to-end Simultaneous Speech Translation July 2022 to May 2023 Responsibility: designing and evaluating the first end-to-end simultaneous translation system for Huawei meeting Achievements: The end-to-end simultaneous translation system has lower latency and higher performance than the cascaded translation system Cascade Simultaneous Speech Translation June 2021 to July 2022 Responsibility: designing and developing cascade simultaneous translation system for Huawei meeting Achievements: SST end-to-end BLEU scores (EN<-> ZH) on par with existing commercial systems; The service successfully supported 110 + online conference sessions and 30 + onsite SST translation service for 2021/2022 Huawei STW event Knowledge-enhanced NMT September 2020 to May 2021 Responsibility: designing, implementing and evaluating knowledge-enhance NMT algorithms based on topic modelling and homographic representation learning (HDR) Achievements: BLEU enhancement on the vanllia transformer Topic-enhanced model (+1.
